Projects.Title: Chat App
Projects.Description: A full MERN stack responsive application for live chatting using React,Node,Web Sockets and MongoDB for saving chats and friends

Projects.Title: Football App
Projects.Description: A full stack MERN responsive Football application for viewing table leagues , top scorers and matches dates and scores.Backend established for registering,logging users and adding comments

Projects.Title: Wedding Organizer App
Projects.Description: Full stack responsive app for a wedding organizer using React , Redux , Hooks and a fake server

Projects.Title: Movies App
Projects.Description: Frontend responsive movies application for displaying Now playing , Top rated Movies including rating trailers and brief using TMDB API , React , Bootstrap and Axios

Projects.Title: Floral Shop
Projects.Description: Frontend responsive application for a floral shop using Vanilla Js , HTML&CSS
